titleStmt.title: A Perfect relation of the taking of the towne of Preston in Lancashire by the Parliaments forces under the command of Colonell Sir John Seaton on Thursday the ninth day of February, 1642 as it was certified by some gentlemen of repute in the same county to a member of the House of Commons, with the names of those that were slain : together with very good nevvs from Cheshire.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
